main event: An unidentified flying object was observed in Baltimore, Maryland on August 25, 1974, described as flying in a circular motion.
interesting points: The sighting involved a bright light moving at high speed in a circular pattern,Reports indicated this could have been a balloon, but the appearance was not consistent with balloon behavior,The observation lasted for less than 2 minutes,Weather conditions were clear at the time of the sighting,Multiple evaluations classed the source as unknown.
sighted object: A bright light moving in a circular motion
witness description: The witnesses included military personnel who were reliable observers.
